# section

**Instance Property**

The value of the section element of the index path.

## Declaration

```swift
var section: Int { get set }
```

## Working with Special Node Names

- **item**: The value of the item element of the index path.
- **row**: The value of the row element of the index path.

items.description: The value of the item element of the index path.
items.name: item

items.description: The value of the row element of the index path.
items.name: row

title: section
